mapper.select: SELECT c.*, m.name as writer_name, m.photo_src FROM comment c JOIN member m on c.writer = m.id where tidx = #{tidx} order by od asc

SELECT c.*, m.name as writer_name, m.photo_src, p.pidx, p.title as project_title, t.title as task_title FROM comment c JOIN member m on c.writer = m.id JOIN task t on c.tidx = t.tidx JOIN project p on t.pidx = p.pidx WHERE c.tidx in (SELECT tidx FROM task where pidx in (SELECT pidx FROM project_access where mid = #{mid})) order by c.update_date asc limit 10
SELECT IFNULL(max(od), 0) + 1 as od FROM `comment` WHERE tidx = #{tidx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment SET tidx = #{tidx}, parent = #{parent}, depth = #{depth}, od = #{od}, tag = #{tag}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, register_date = now(), update_date = now();
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{content}, tag = #{tag}, update_date = now() where cidx = #{cidx}
UPDATE comment SET od = od + 1 where tidx = #{tidx} and od >= #{od}
